content: The Math.exp(double) method, a special case of pow, returns e to the power of the parameter. In addition, double Math.expm1(double) returns (ex - 1). Both of these methods are more accurate and convenient in these special cases.
stemmed: the math.exp ( doubl ) method , special case pow , return e power paramet . In addit , doubl math.expm1 ( doubl ) return ( ex - 1 ) . both method accur conveni special case .
